translations:
proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. CommunicationPartners.node_props P = NetModel_node_props P

definition "CommunicationPartners_eval G P = (wf_list_graph G \<and> 
  sinvar G (SecurityInvariant.node_props SINVAR_CommunicationPartners.default_node_properties P))"

interpretation CommunicationPartners_impl:TopoS_List_Impl 
  where default_node_properties=SINVAR_CommunicationPartners.default_node_properties
  and sinvar_spec=SINVAR_CommunicationPartners.sinvar
  and sinvar_impl=sinvar
  and receiver_violation=SINVAR_CommunicationPartners.receiver_violation
  and offending_flows_impl=CommunicationPartners_offending_list
  and node_props_impl=NetModel_node_props
  and eval_impl=CommunicationPartners_eval

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. TopoS_List_Impl SINVAR_CommunicationPartners.default_node_properties
     SINVAR_CommunicationPartners.sinvar sinvar
     SINVAR_CommunicationPartners.receiver_violation
     CommunicationPartners_offending_list NetModel_node_props
     CommunicationPartners_eval

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (SecurityInvariant SINVAR_CommunicationPartners.sinvar
      SINVAR_CommunicationPartners.default_node_properties
      SINVAR_CommunicationPartners.receiver_violation \<and>
     (\<forall>G nP.
         wf_list_graph G \<longrightarrow>
         SINVAR_CommunicationPartners.sinvar (list_graph_to_graph G) nP =
         sinvar G nP)) \<and>
    (\<forall>G nP.
        wf_list_graph G \<longrightarrow>
        set_offending_flows (list_graph_to_graph G) nP =
        set ` set (CommunicationPartners_offending_list G nP)) \<and>
    (\<forall>P.
        CommunicationPartners.node_props_formaldef P =
        NetModel_node_props P) \<and>
    (\<forall>G P.
        (distinct (nodesL G) \<and>
         distinct (edgesL G) \<and>
         CommunicationPartners.eval (list_graph_to_graph G) P) =
        CommunicationPartners_eval G P)

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. SecurityInvariant SINVAR_CommunicationPartners.sinvar
     SINVAR_CommunicationPartners.default_node_properties
     SINVAR_CommunicationPartners.receiver_violation \<and>
    (\<forall>G nP.
        wf_list_graph G \<longrightarrow>
        SINVAR_CommunicationPartners.sinvar (list_graph_to_graph G) nP =
        sinvar G nP)
 2. (\<forall>G nP.
        wf_list_graph G \<longrightarrow>
        set_offending_flows (list_graph_to_graph G) nP =
        set ` set (CommunicationPartners_offending_list G nP)) \<and>
    (\<forall>P.
        CommunicationPartners.node_props_formaldef P =
        NetModel_node_props P) \<and>
    (\<forall>G P.
        (distinct (nodesL G) \<and>
         distinct (edgesL G) \<and>
         CommunicationPartners.eval (list_graph_to_graph G) P) =
        CommunicationPartners_eval G P)

 1. \<forall>G nP.

apply(simp add: list_graph_to_graph_def CommunicationPartners_offending_set CommunicationPartners_offending_set_def CommunicationPartners_offending_list_def)

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. (\<forall>P.

        NetModel_node_props P) \<and>
    (\<forall>G P.

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<forall>P.
       CommunicationPartners.node_props_formaldef P = NetModel_node_props P
 2. \<forall>G P.
       (distinct (nodesL G) \<and>
        distinct (edgesL G) \<and>
        CommunicationPartners.eval (list_graph_to_graph G) P) =
       CommunicationPartners_eval G P

proof (prove)
goal (2 subgoals):
 1. \<forall>P.
       CommunicationPartners.node_props_formaldef P =
       (\<lambda>i.
           case node_properties P i of
           None \<Rightarrow>
             SINVAR_CommunicationPartners.default_node_properties
           | Some property \<Rightarrow> property)
 2. \<forall>G P.
       (distinct (nodesL G) \<and>
        distinct (edgesL G) \<and>
        CommunicationPartners.eval (list_graph_to_graph G) P) =
       CommunicationPartners_eval G P

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<forall>G P.
       (distinct (nodesL G) \<and>
        distinct (edgesL G) \<and>
        CommunicationPartners.eval (list_graph_to_graph G) P) =
       CommunicationPartners_eval G P

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<forall>G P.
       (distinct (nodesL G) \<and>
        distinct (edgesL G) \<and>
        CommunicationPartners.eval (list_graph_to_graph G) P) =
       (wf_list_graph G \<and>
        sinvar G (CommunicationPartners.node_props P))

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<forall>G P.
       (wf_list_graph G \<and>
        (\<forall>x\<in>edges (list_graph_to_graph G).
            case x of
            (s, r) \<Rightarrow>
              s \<noteq> r \<longrightarrow>
              allowed_flow
               (case node_properties P s of
                None \<Rightarrow>
                  SINVAR_CommunicationPartners.default_node_properties
                | Some property \<Rightarrow> property)
               s (case node_properties P r of
                  None \<Rightarrow>
                    SINVAR_CommunicationPartners.default_node_properties
                  | Some property \<Rightarrow> property)
               r)) =
       (wf_list_graph G \<and>
        (\<forall>x\<in>set (edgesL G).
            case x of
            (s, r) \<Rightarrow>
              s \<noteq> r \<longrightarrow>
              allowed_flow
               (case node_properties P s of
                None \<Rightarrow>
                  SINVAR_CommunicationPartners.default_node_properties
                | Some property \<Rightarrow> property)
               s (case node_properties P r of
                  None \<Rightarrow>
                    SINVAR_CommunicationPartners.default_node_properties
                  | Some property \<Rightarrow> property)
               r))

definition SINVAR_LIB_CommunicationPartners :: "('v::vertex, 'v SINVAR_CommunicationPartners.node_config) TopoS_packed" where
    "SINVAR_LIB_CommunicationPartners \<equiv> 
    \<lparr> nm_name = ''CommunicationPartners'', 
      nm_receiver_violation = SINVAR_CommunicationPartners.receiver_violation,
      nm_default = SINVAR_CommunicationPartners.default_node_properties, 
      nm_sinvar = sinvar,
      nm_offending_flows = CommunicationPartners_offending_list, 
      nm_node_props = NetModel_node_props,
      nm_eval = CommunicationPartners_eval
      \<rparr>"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. TopoS_modelLibrary SINVAR_LIB_CommunicationPartners
     SINVAR_CommunicationPartners.sinvar
